divs: Sighting DetailsI WAS AT HOME WENT OUTSIDE AROUND 12 AM TO SMOKE PULSATING LIGHTS CAUGHT MY ATTENTION I WATCHED LIGHTS WHILE I SMOKED THE LIGHTS OR OBJECT MOVED SLIGHTLY TO MY LEFT AND BACK TO ORIGINAL POSITION,I WAS OUT ABOUT 5 MINS.HAD NO IDEA WHAT OBJECT WAS.WENT BACK OUT 10 MINS LATER OBJECT STILL THERE IN SAME PLACE,WATCHED FOR ABOUT 8-1O MORE MINS,OBJECT KEPT HOVERING IN SAME SPOT,THE LIGHTS ON OBJECT KEPT CHANGING COLORS FROM RED,BLUE,ORANGE,MAIN COLOR GLOWING WHITE,ABOUT 12:30 AM WENT BACK OUT OBJECT STILL THERE WATCHED IT THIS TIME FOR ABOUT 10 MINS KEPT HOVERING AND DROPPED DOWN ABOUT 10 FEET MAYBE AND THEN BACK UP TO ORIGINAL POSITION,WENT BACK INSIDE LOOKED OUT BATHROOM WINDOW STILL THERE.MY FEELINGS WERE OH MY GOD I SEE ANOTHER UNKNWON OBJECT.WENT BACK K OUT AROUND 1 AM OBJECT STILL THERE DOING SAME ACTIONS LIGHTS PULSATING CHANGING COLORS KEPT MOVING TO LEFT AND BACK TO ORIGINAL SPOT THIS TIME I WATCHED IT FOR ABOUT 15 -2O MINS,NEVER CHANGED POSITION KEPT DOING SAME MOVEMENTS,NEVER LOST SIGHT I FINALLY WENT IN AROUND 1:30 AM AND LAID DOWN.I WOKE UP MY AUNT AROUND 12:30 AM SO SHE COULD SEE IT HER REACTION WAS I DON'T KNOW WHAT IT WAS.DON'T KNOW HOW LONG IT STAYED IN AREA.BUT I KNOW IT WAS NO AIRPLANE HELICOPTER OR ANY KNOWN FLYING MACHINE I KNOW OF.
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Rockingham
There were no other sightings in Rockingham on or around November 8th 2011
